mapper.select: SELECT o.order_id, o.order_time, p.product_id as 'order_product.product_id', p.product_title as 'order_product.product_title', p.product_imgAddr as 'order_product.product_imgAddr', o.order_quantity, o.order_price FROM orderTable o, product p WHERE o.order_product = p.product_id and o.order_user_id = #{userId}
